Read/write interface for 'data-binding'.

Instance Variables hide inherited show inherited

change(default,null) : prime.signals.Signal2<T, OldValue<T>>

inherited from prime.bindable.IBindableReadonly
Dispatched just before "value" is set to a new value. Signal arguments: new-value, old-value

value(default,null) : T

Value property with write access.

Instance Methods hide inherited show inherited

bind(otherBindable : IBindableReadonly<T>) : Void

Makes sure this value is (and remains) equal to otherBindable.value In other words: - update this.value when otherBindable changes

dispose() : Void

inherited from prime.core.traits.IDisposable

pair(otherBindable : IBindable<T>) : Void

Makes sure this Bindable and otherBindable always have the same value. In other words: - update this when otherBindable.value changes - update otherBindable when this.value changes

unbind(otherBindable : IBindableReadonly<T>) : Bool

inherited from prime.bindable.IBindableReadonly
returns
true when a connection was removed
Remove any connections between this IChangeNotifier and 'otherBindable'
